title: New: SOHN – Bloodflows
body:
We were teased the prospect of a new track by **SOHN** earlier this week and the bro wasn’t lying, after a couple of fairly high-profile remixes we finally have new material in the form of Bloodflows.

**SOHN**’s voice has definitely come into its own, confident yet strained, he’s finally found a range that mirrors the production’s visceral clarity. In short, it’s his most assured and focused work to date, with the tracks structure at times flawless, the track’s ending builds to something utterly breathless, an adjective I hadn’t previously associated with **SOHN**’s work.

Hit play and check **SOHN**’s upcoming live dates below: oh shit, **Crack in the Road** are putting him on at their SXSW showcase??!! Man, those kidz r c00l.

**[RSVP HERE.](http://www.eventbrite.com/event/5703238540?ref=ebtn#)**

_March__  
**_13/03 – BD Rileys – Crack In The Road/Disco Naivete – Austin SXSW_**  
_13/03 – Red 7 – Windish Agency Showcase – Austin SXSW_  
_14/03 – Hype Hotel – I Guess I’m Floating – Austin SXSW_  
_15/03 – Mohawk – Windish Agency Day Party – Austin SXSW_  
_16/03 – Latitude 30 – British Music Embassy – Austin SXSW__

_April  
06/04 – Motel Mozaique Festival – Rotterdam, Netherlands  
12/04 – Sound Frame Festival – Vienna, Austraia  
13/04 – Prince Charles – Berlin, Germany_

_May  
18/05 – Food For Your Senses Festival – Tuntage, Luxembourg  
25/05 – London Calling – Amsterdam, Netherlands_

_July  
03/07 – Poolbar Festival – Feldkirch, Austraia  
04/07 – Days Off Festival – Paris, France  
19-21 – Longtitude Festival – Dublin, Ireland_

_August__  
_10/08 – Oya Festival – Oslo, Norway__
